I bought this game when it was not free to play.
Even then the game was trash.
After it became FTP, still trash.

I remember how much CS 1.6 cared for every aspect of the game, balancing all it content.
Looks like CS GO just slapped the whole content and said it a product without caring on what they were delivering.

One of the worst shooting games I have ever played.
Graphics are worse than in CS 1.6, on how these provide to the player experience, and the music is just nonsense.
The sound effect are so bad that you no longer know what you are listening to, every aspect of this game is bad.
A shameful remake of CS 1.6.
